p.k: Apple is challenged to a fight by a grumpy Cheesesteak so he and Onion go on a quest to find the source of Cheesesteak's grumpiness. / Apple and Onion square off against a no-nonsense security guard after they’re banned from the premiere of their friend Hot Dog’s new movie. / Apple and Onion have to find a way to ride the Hot Air Balloon which is in their town for one day only.
